responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "CC76905F44B2559E419C57B2844DEA1B", "Volton is djinn shackled by his own powers and unable to escape. The gobbun siphon off this djinns unlimited power to power all of civilization. The need of the many outweigh the need of one. But there is a secret cult that pays homage to Volton. They are not benevolent, but driven by rage and anarcy. They wish to free the djinn and have asked me to assist. I would normally never ally with such doomsayers, but in exchange, they offer me a drop of Volton\'s power. ")
name: MIDD_0015_AAV_ClockworkCodex_13
